title: Worship as Covenant Renewal
author: Kevin DeYoung
dc:creator: Kevin DeYoung
description: The historic liturgy of the Christian church did not originate in evangelicalism, or in the Reformation, or in Europe. It grew out of Old Testament (and then New Testament) assumptions about what it meant for God’s people to gather and renew the covenant.
content:encoded: The historic liturgy of the Christian church did not originate in evangelicalism, or in the Reformation, or in Europe. It grew out of Old Testament (and then New Testament) assumptions about what it meant for God’s people to gather and renew the covenant.
itunes:title: Worship as Covenant Renewal
